segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your income sources and how they can contribute to your overall investment strategy. Do you have any current forms of income you’d like to discuss?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I mean, I get a salary of like, uh, 4,500 a month, right? And that’s, like, net after taxes. I’m really excited about what I can do with that!

segments.advisor_message: That’s a solid monthly income! Are there any other sources of income coming in? Maybe something like rental or side businesses?
segments.client_message: Oh! I also have some rental income, uh, from a property I got. It’s about a thousand dollars, like, every month! I’m lookin' forward to, you know, investing that as well!

segments.advisor_message: Great! So, you’ve got salary and rental income that you can potentially grow through investments. Do you have any personal goals regarding how you want to see this money work for you?
segments.client_message: Absolutely! I’m hoping to, ya know, grow this to, like, maybe retire early or something. I mean, I think I can manage it until 2035, right?
